website_summaries.verdict: Cosmetic and physiological benefits from this product.
pros: This nutrient-focused formula improves overall hair growth and contains ancillary benefits
There are 18 essential vitamins and minerals in this product
cons: While we love the beard growth, we would prefer a better-tasting product

customer_reviews.title: I’m a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work, I was expecting a lot more from it, I’m a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very sure this product works or I’m just someone ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very sure this product works or I’m just someone that’ll never have a beard lol. I’ve gone through 3 bottles and not a very big difference
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Kept reading positive reviews so I decided to give It a try. Tasted awful and didn't really notice any "fullness" look to it. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M W

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Did not notice any change at all in hair growth. Beard looks exactly the same from day one to day 30. Buy at ur own risk
customer_reviews.author: Robert Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Rash and itchy face
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me rash instead of hair growth. My face became full red and very itchy.
customer_reviews.author: M.M

customer_reviews.title: Doubt I will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished the last of this the other day. It didn't work too well for me, but that's not to say it wouldn't work for someone else! Did not witness no obvious changes! I probably will not order again!
customer_reviews.author: Juggernaut

customer_reviews.title: Haven't seen any improvements, however, since it contains ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen any improvements, however, since it contains most of the required vitamins for the body. No complaints but definitely no praise either.
customer_reviews.author: Bijay Shrestha

customer_reviews.title: Can cause irritating rash.
customer_reviews.text: This product has given me a terrible rash all along my arms. Also didnt help with growth at all. Will not buy again, awful product.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: No noticable results after 2wks
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks in and no noticeable difference in beard growth rate. I have also not found it to fill in any patchy areas. Will finish out supply and update review if results vary. Product does have great nutritional ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Countryman

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I only have 3 days left of this bottle and I haven't seen any change in thickness or anything. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I usually consider things like this to be the equivalent of snake oil. I have to say though, this stuff really works. I've tried to grow a beard for most of my adult life and only ever managed scruff. After I started taking these pills, I have an actual full beard on my face. Granted, I'm not going to win any "best beard" awards, but it's a beard and I get compliments on it. I'm on my fifth bottle now and don't see myself stopping any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Warneke

customer_reviews.title: It works but may be slow going for the beard challenged like myself
customer_reviews.text: Not the best tasting but far from the worst either but it seems to be working ok so far 15days in since starting a daily routine of taking it definitely filling in better and more evenly than without it so it seems to be working still can't grow a beard as fast as alot of my friends but hey atleast I'm growing one now allbeit slowly
customer_reviews.author: Zach G.

customer_reviews.title: Not so much...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give it a good trial so used Iron Beard for six weeks so far... don’t really see any difference from my normal beard growth... Can’t say as I’d recommend product...
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Slow progress but hoping for the best!
customer_reviews.text: Using iron beard for 3 weeks now and I think there is some progress with my beard but not yet noticeable. Hoping for a more visible improvement in the coming weeks. Too early to say thumbs up or down... will update rating and feedback in 3-4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: ironwill20

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my boyfriend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my boyfriend. I literally see him once a week because of distance but each week his beard looks fuller, longer and better! Also don’t expect your beard to grow if you’re just taking pills. You must also take care of your beard by moisturizing it, washing it, and softly brushing it. If not, it will just grow but the growth will not be retained due to breakage and lack of up keep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a pretty nice product don't really see much of ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a pretty nice product don't really see much of a change in my facial hair but do believe it is the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Patrick Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I am growing a beard right now. I have started growing it from last one month. I was looking to buy a supplement for vitamin-a, vitamin b5 and zinc for my acne. This supplement has everything I want plus the supplement to grow a nice beard. I can’t say how good the product is for growing your beard. But it definitely has helped me with my acne. I will keep taking it and if I see any improvement in my beard I’ll post it and update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Vaibhav Singh Tokas

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a little bit of filling in the patches I had before. Not night and day difference, but a slight improvement
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why so many negative reviews on here must be from guys that could never grow hair on their faces from the start! This product has worked great for me in the first 30 days just started my second bottle a few days ago and while the results aren’t magic they’re very noticeable. It has helped my beard grow thicker n fill in the spots that didn’t grow before. This is the second beard growth product I have used and it far exceeds the previous one at a much cheaper price!
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product with results! I could not grow a beard to save my life. It was patchy and would grow faster in one place than the other, not evenly. Bought this and thought I'd give it a try. Patches started going away, started growing hair on my face evenly, and now I have a beard that's fuller and thicker than before. If I could give it 6 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Cristobal Quezada

customer_reviews.title: I am not quite satisfied yet with the results of how full it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I am starting off this review as four stars as I have noticed that my beard has become a little Fuller and a lot healthier. I have been using this product for about 2 weeks and have noticed these results. I am not quite satisfied yet with the results of how full it is that is why I'm waiting another few weeks to either add or drop Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it really does work.
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised. I have always suffered from 2 patches on my cheeks when trying to grow a beard, but after about a month of taking these, the patches are growing in, and I can notice my beard is thicker overall. Pretty good product, smells nasty, but it seems to work. So I couldn't ask for much more.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these everyday for almost 3 weeks and I have already noticed my beard feeling super soft and not britle anymore. To me it looks like my patches have baby hairs coming in which is a huge plus! I will continue taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: havent lost as much hair when brushing beard, but not helped much with patchy areas
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Joel Porta

customer_reviews.title: To be honest, I don’t really know if it ...
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I don’t really know if it worked since i haven’t seen noticeable growth but who knows? Maybe it just didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not feel anything...
customer_reviews.text: It seems it didnt make anything bad. Just nothing. I had and have some blank spots they are remain the same... Only what I feel that I wasted some money............. : )
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy

customer_reviews.title: Not Much
customer_reviews.text: It kinda works. My mustache is thicker. More hair came out from places that didn’t before, but it all just a little. Guess I expected too much. I used this in conjunction with a beard growth oil.
customer_reviews.author: Vy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Yes so far no changes in my beard but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes so far no changes in my beard but it does work on my hair and nails with the help of the biotin in it loving it just for that though as for the beard growth nothing and I believe I'm on my third bottle right now but that doesn't mean I'm going to be giving up on it I'm going to keep ordering more soon just to see that change in my beard thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: It does work
customer_reviews.text: Ok there really is no flavor lol. But it smells like a cereal. It does work. Ot says take 2 pills at once but like I have been doing is just taking one when I wake up and one at lunch. It has b12 witch is energy. You do have to switch up on your eating habits. Like eat healthy. Just think as your model and you have to be the wright weight.
customer_reviews.author: David Cummings

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: It's been about 3 weeks and I do feel I'm seeing some added growth in areas of my beard that were pretty thin up until this point. A little early to tell but I am excited about what I see so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 3 or 4 bottles of these supplements and they do indeed work well, beard & head hair as well as fingernails !
customer_reviews.author: Glen Three Hawks

customer_reviews.title: Helpful at very long term
customer_reviews.text: I would say it helps but very slowly, due to vitamins b12, it causes you to urinate a lot, like every 5 minutes, I don’t know if someone else noticed this. Maybe if you take it for years, you might see a difference, but it also helped my hair due to biotin.
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T WORK ON ME..
customer_reviews.text: I really like the packaging, it came faster than i expected but i honestly didn't see much difference or changes on me.. So i guess it depends.
customer_reviews.author: wander

customer_reviews.title: Does not work !!!! Buy vitamins at anyother store for cheaper
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work at all !!! Used it for 3 weeks straight everyday dont recomend it did not see any growth at all i mean it all depends on genetics i guess but i suggest you buy vitamins from other stores like walmart , target , etc.. alot cheaper if u want no results . Dont recommend it at all 0 stars if i can use also it makes you breakout well it did too me
customer_reviews.author: Kahris

customer_reviews.title: It works, just give it time
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I had my doubts when it came to beard growth products. My beard was always smooth and full with a hidden bald patch, but after two months of use today Afterlight getting a trim and exposing all that hair that had grown in the past two months I finally see the difference. It's really silky, the silkiest it has ever been and the bald patch is now full.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Mulla

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why any company would include potent Dht blockers such as Saw Palmetto in a beard formulation.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love Zhou!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this company "Brand" as I use their other products. I have had such great results from their other products that I am still waiting to see how the results are and will follow up after this first bottle is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Looking to grow your beard back or quickly.
customer_reviews.text: It helped my beard look shiny. But I didn’t get any extra beard. I didn’t grow any longer than what it’s stopped at. But it did grow faster. Trimmed it up twice since using.
customer_reviews.author: Kraken

customer_reviews.title: Still awaiting wether this actually helps or not
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it but have seen much change in beard growth but I still have a few pills left so it may turn around.
customer_reviews.author: justin dale

customer_reviews.title: Still fresh into this but seems to be helping!
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m about 3 weeks in! I have been taking two daily as it suggest and I feel there have been improvements already...I took before pictures and I am going to keep at it! I’ll come back to change to 5 stars if I can really tell and see a difference when I’m done.
customer_reviews.author: knives

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did notice some growth. Not sure if it’s any faster. Bald spots still there.
customer_reviews.author: Justin neblett

customer_reviews.title: I feel like this really might have helped support a stronger plus ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this really might have helped support a stronger plus fuller beard because after I stopped taking the supplement because I run out, my facial hair didn’t seem grow in as thick or full. I’m hoping to continue using to hopefully see it help my head, beard and body hair become thicker, more filled in, sexier, and manlier. *fingers crossed*
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to get more volume and fill in my beard and have tried a lot of options, this is a great choice for me!
customer_reviews.author: bees joon

customer_reviews.title: ... results getting little blonde baby hairs which is way better than none
customer_reviews.text: Only my first week on this product but I somewhat already see results getting little blonde baby hairs which is way better than none. Seems to make my beard hair thicker and healthier! So far I highly recommend this product. Give it a try wont hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Egzon

customer_reviews.title: Are you a pre-pubesent squire?
customer_reviews.text: So far I have been using this for 3weeks and a few days. I really think this has been helping with speed of growth on my beard. I by no means have a grecian god beard, but at least this has helped me surpass the beard growing prowess of a pre-pubesent squire. Definitely going to keep purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reining

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It's getting thicker in places where my hair would already grow. Slowly filling in patchy spots. Gonna try another months worth see what happenes
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: This helped my already glorious beard reach its full Viking ...
customer_reviews.text: This helped my already glorious beard reach its full Viking potential, I have swaths of maidens at my feet begging for an opportunity to brush it. Thank you iron beard!
customer_reviews.author: Garner J.

customer_reviews.title: Caused heart palpitations 1 week in
customer_reviews.text: In my own experience, taking these supplements in the prescribed recommended amount seemed to have caused odd heart palpitations, thus causing me to cease taking them. Heart concerns run in my family and if they do in yours as well, I would advise you to stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grew everywhere but my face
customer_reviews.text: Oh they make you grow hair just everywhere else but your face
customer_reviews.author: Nichales

customer_reviews.title: Slow but effective
customer_reviews.text: The bottle smells kinda funky when you open it but the pills have no taste and are just like any other pill. I had a pretty scraggly beard, but after a few weeks of using the product I could start to notice small improvements. I haven't finished the bottle yet but I just shaved clean and it seems to be growing in a bit quicker and not even.
customer_reviews.author: Nirav Barman

customer_reviews.title: worked great and love Zhou products
customer_reviews.text: worked great and love Zhou products. Didn't let me down, did help my beard grow fuller and thicker instead of the red neck mess I had. :)
customer_reviews.author: Steve E.

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because it was an Amazon pick and had really good reviews. It’s been about 3 weeks and I can definitely tell the difference. My patchy and thin areas are slowly starting to look a lot fuller and thicker. Hopefully with time they’ll completely fill in!
customer_reviews.author: Matty Ice

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for two month and so far I haven’t seen any minimal noticeble result. I hope they would offer refunds because the product is too expensive for no results.
customer_reviews.author: Vitrudent

customer_reviews.title: Eat food first
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see much growth but it should always be taken with food!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Meregini

customer_reviews.title: New user,  waiting for the effects
customer_reviews.text: Just got my first bottle of Iron Beard. Fast shipping & a good price. You're supposed to use 1-3 months to get the full effect. I'll post again when it's had a chance to have an effect.
customer_reviews.author: Syrbruce

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Its working decent, just have to keep at it consistently and for a few months too.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Peeters

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredible. In just two weeks I am already seeing results. As someone with naturally growing thin patchy hair I often times get discouraged or anxious after months of attempting to grow a beard and end up shaving it all off. I cannot wait to see what my face will look like in 90 days!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair look healthier
customer_reviews.text: Tast isn’t the greatest but doesn’t linger around. I noticed a difference after I was on my second bottle. I have always been able to grow a beard I just used it to see if it would grow faster. Definitely makes your hair look healthier.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Its noticeable enough that ive had lots of compliments on how great it looks
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a difference in the first couple weeks. beard is healthier and thicker. Its noticeable enough that ive had lots of compliments on how great it looks.
customer_reviews.author: De St.Aubin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Followed all the instructions, took daily at the same time everyday, didn't work. Maybe my body is different who knows but just didn't work for me honestly. Waste of money imo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with patchy spots and making the fuller look!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well, does cause you to need to use restroom more because of the percentage of vitamins but the growth aspect and how full/thick my hair is growing in is great!! I have noticed I can cover up my patchy areas faster because of the thickness. Looking forward to seeing it play out in the long run!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob pellinger

customer_reviews.title: ... after using Beard Grow XL because it was a great deal cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after using Beard Grow XL because it was a great deal cheaper. I was pleasantly surprised about how well it worked. A few spots where I have less hair growth are now noticeably fuller than before. Lower price, and better results? Please and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M.

customer_reviews.title: I'm half-way through my 1st bottle and even though the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm half-way through my 1st bottle and even though the product label suggests you use it for 30 days before you see results, I believe my one odd bald spot in my beard is starting to go away! I will follow up on this after using the product a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I was a little apprehensive at first
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I was a little apprehensive at first, but after taking the supplement daily for a little over 2 weeks I started to notice patches gradually filling in. Obviously not an instant boost but definitely helps. I also noticed that my fingernails needed clipping more often than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Heyrana

customer_reviews.title: Good product with reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I did a little research before I bought this product. It seems this product contains the nutrition needed for growing fuller beard, plus it is better for the hair in general. I am still taking my first bottle of IRON BEARD. I will continue taking it and see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: This supplement is effective and most importantly does not cause ...
customer_reviews.text: This supplement is effective and most importantly does not cause any unpleasant side effects which I often find with herbal supplements. I plan to continue using it. My stylist recommended this for hair but beard growth seems noticeably more robust after a very short period of use.
customer_reviews.author: jasper

customer_reviews.title: Try these out!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, doing wondering for my facial hair and length of my head hair. Highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Eric Feeler

customer_reviews.title: Increase thickness
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to do the trick, I noticed my beard started looking thicker then it has been in the past, I will definitely keep taking these when I can.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Confidence booster
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to keep this short - since I started using this I've been having hair grow back in places it hasn't been for a while and my skin has been looking great. I think I'll be using this for a while
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but I think you should get more for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Not a magic pill promising to solve all your hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a magic pill promising to solve all your hair growth issues, but a safe all natural pill that does improve the strength and quality of your beard hair.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip E.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product for those who have trouble getting their ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but I’ve been using it for about 2 1/2 weeks now and it truly has been working for me. I highly recommend this product for those who have trouble getting their beard started or for those who want to speed up the beard growth process!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Filling in
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for a month now and noticed my patchy areas are not so patchy now. It's not completely filled in, but it's better than it has ever been.
customer_reviews.author: Spine doc

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great! Has good vitamin content and i can tell ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Has good vitamin content and i can tell my hair is healthier :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! Always been hard for me to grow a beard without light patches. Iron Beard helped fill in the patches and now the beard is much fuller. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dong

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I got bamboozled. Did not work as stated, and no improvement on beard at all. I used it as directed until the bottle ran out and no visiable changes. Going to try a different product instead.
customer_reviews.author: Frank I.

customer_reviews.title: and his hair is looking better too! It's only been 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband, and he absolutely loves them! He's noticed an increase in his beard's softness, thickness, and his hair is looking better too! It's only been 2 weeks, so hopefully we start seeing an increase in length as well!! Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: To test it I first completely shaved and started taking ...
customer_reviews.text: To test it I first completely shaved and started taking these. With 2 weeks I could definitely see less to no patches and my beard is growing longer and fuller. Will definitely be buying another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received the product two days after ordering it. ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the product two days after ordering it. I have been using it for two weeks now and i can tell the difference. My beard is getting a little thicker and fuller. I’m curious to see how it would look after a month
customer_reviews.author: Masangu Ngoy

customer_reviews.title: I can notice a difference in fullness in just three ...
customer_reviews.text: I can notice a difference in fullness in just three weeks. I am interested in continuing the product to see more improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: About 15 days in and can totally see a difference ...
customer_reviews.text: About 15 days in and can totally see a difference! Excited to see how the rest of the way goes and what happens after I stop taking it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: ... and my beard look thicker then it did before great product.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this stuff for 2 maybe 3 weeks now and my beard look thicker then it did before great product.
customer_reviews.author: jesus e.

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical of how some pills could help me ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of how some pills could help me fill out my beard but after using it a month I can honestly say it works very well. My mustache filled in, my beard got thiker and darker. Honestly if your looking for something to help out your beard try this out.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Rainville

customer_reviews.title: Consistency WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just be consistent in taking the pills. Ignore the bumps as my skin reacts very harshly with razors. But the product worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: itzdio

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I noticed darkening and increased thickness of facial hair after a bottle. It was good enough to order another. It did not fill the patches I wanted, but I did not expect it to work perfectly. If it filled the patches I’d give it 100 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My beard has really thickened up!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I can tell a big difference with my beard!!
customer_reviews.author: Beau Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Cause wait for my beard to be nice and full
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking for almost a month. I've. Noticed my beard is actually having growth where there was none. Also my body hair is increasing (woof) I will continue to use. Can't wait for my beard to be nice and full.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Olson

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product! It's taking a min but I see growth. I think it has to get in you system then you will really see growth
customer_reviews.author: Clinton S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Kinda works so far!
customer_reviews.text: Been taking this every morning for a couple weeks,seems to be working, my patch spots are looking a little less patchy every day.
customer_reviews.author: jerad harvey

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging. Pills are small and easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.text: Got the package really fast. Liked the packaging on it and the pills are easy to swallow. Been taking it for about a week now, maybe noticing minor improvements in beard growth already, will be taking this product for a few months to see how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: martin corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Makes you sick
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, took 2 the first day, felt sick all day, took 1 the next day and still felt terrible
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Block

customer_reviews.title: While It has in fact caused faster growth ( and done great things for my skin)
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these supplements for about 3 weeks now. While It has in fact caused faster growth ( and done great things for my skin), there are still a few patchy areas. But honestly, the skin benefits alone are worth it. definitely plan on ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I had never tried to grow a beard before but ...
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried to grow a beard before but only shaved every 2-3 days. I wasn't sure what kind of success I'd have but stopped shaving on Christmas Day. I started using Iron Beard in mid January and WOW. I'm loving my beard!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim E Kelly

customer_reviews.title: What I like the most is that it's vegan
customer_reviews.text: Nearly at end of first bottle and I have noticed the difference. The hair gotten thicker and grow bit fast. The patchy areas are sloooooowly filling up. What I like the most is that it's vegan.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Barrera

customer_reviews.title: After the second bottle im definitely noticing thicker hair on ...
customer_reviews.text: After the second bottle im definitely noticing thicker hair on my face. While it doesn’t grow in any bald spots it definitely makes up for with thicker hair
customer_reviews.author: Turbolius

customer_reviews.title: So far I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using the product for about 2 weeks now. Already i have noticed a increase in growth speed. I can't speak for a thicker fuller beard yet but I will update after a couple months use. So far I am happy with this product and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: It's working so far!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I bought a suggested package through amazon containing this product, beard oil, and a beard balm, and as a young man trying to start facial hair growth, I am starting to notice the "peach fuzz" getting thicker and growing faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Thicker and Fuller!
customer_reviews.text: I've went through a whole bottle so far and just received my 2nd.. this will be something I always use to get the most out of my beard. The formula works and the ingredients are great!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t been using it for too long, but over ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t been using it for too long, but over the first few weeks I’ve already noticed improvement in the thickness if my facial hair — far less patchy already. Looking forward to seeing what happens from here
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I cannot say I like it or dislike it so far
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say I like it or dislike it so far. I have not seen results at the 2 week mark. Will post final review in another 2 or 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Fernando Magaña

product_meta.title: Zhou Nutrition Iron Beard, Growth Vitamin Supplement for Men, 60 Capsules
product_meta.description: You asked for it, men—and we delivered. Zhou Nutrition, the makers of best-selling women's Formula Hairfluence, is proud to introduce iron beard—a formula scientifically designed for the beard-crafting man. Perfect for all hair types, Our trademarked herbal blend delivers hydrolyzed collagen, 18 essential amino acids, Biotin, and more to help you grow the most glorious beard in all the lands. Our premium complex promotes hair growth from the inside out, helping support thicker coverage, healthy growth, and scalp hair, skin, and nail health, too. Simply take one serving Daily to start seeing results after 3-4 weeks of consistent use. Now get grow in’!
feature_bullets: FULLER, THICKER, MANLIER. Whether you're new to facial hair, or a long-term grower, a glorious beard is what you're after. Iron Beard nourishes from within to help support faster facial hair growth and keep your beard vibrant, silky smooth, and healthy.

POWERFUL NUTRIENT BOOST. Biotin and B vitamins support existing and incoming hair to help you achieve full, thick coverage, while hydrolyzed collagen provides 18 essential amino acids, the building blocks of hair protein, to help boost healthy growth.

EFFECTIVE BOTANICAL SUPPORT. Our trademarked herbal blend features botanicals beneficial to a thick, lustrous beard and overall hair health, including pumpkin seed, nettle extracts, and the Chinese herb fo-ti (also known as he shou wu).

WHAT SETS US APART? At Zhou, we use only the highest-quality ingredients in an FDA certified facility following GMP (good manufacturing practices). Plus, we test everything at our lab in Utah, so you can be confident that you’re fueling your body with the very best.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
